Subject: Adjust resources in VM
Description:
Hi support team,

this customer purchased 12k licenses for Active Data Defence and the contract starts on 1-Jan-2025 (on prem).
Please reach out to the customer in order to schedule a session to adjust the resources and settings in their VM.
I already told them that we recommend to use 16 CPU cores, 56GB RAM und 4 TB HDD. They can only allocate 1 TB HDD at the moment but deployment will be finalized until Q2 next year so the VM will not run on max utilization until then.

Contact is:
